pages.text: "$(#00BFFF)Patience is the key to cold brew coffee—rich in every drop, slowly releasing energy.$()"$(br2)$(#DAA520)Cold Brew Coffee$() is a $(#8B4513)low-temperature extracted coffee$(), with $(#FFD700)lower acidity$() compared to $(#FFD700)Espresso$() or $(#00BFFF)Iced Americano$(), but $(#8B4513)smoother and richer in flavor$().$(br)It is ideal for $(#32CD32)long explorations$(), $(#FFD700)providing a sustained, gentle energy boost$() to keep $(#8B4513)adventurers$() focused.

$(#FFD700)Cold Brew Coffee$() is perfect for players who $(#FF69B4)prefer a smoother taste without high-temperature extraction$() but still want $(#8B4513)a long-lasting caffeine effect$().$(br2)It is $(#FFD700)milder and smoother$() than $(#00BFFF)Iced Americano$(), making it suitable for $(#32CD32)long adventures, mining, or nighttime activities$().

To make $(#FFD700)Cold Brew Coffee$(), you need:$(br2)$(#8B4513)· Coarsely ground $(#FFD700)high-quality coffee beans$()$(br)$(#00BFFF)· Soaked in cold water for an extended period (at least 12 hours)$()$(br)$(#ADD8E6)· Filter out the coffee grounds and enjoy the refreshing cold brew flavor$()$(br2)Compared to $(#FFD700)Espresso$() or $(#00BFFF)Iced Americano$(), $(#FFD700)Cold Brew Coffee$() is $(#8B4513)smoother and gentler$(), perfect for $(#32CD32)slow-paced adventurers$().

pages.title: Cold Brew Features
pages.text: $(#FFD700)Effects when consumed$():$(br2)· $(#32CD32)Long-lasting and gradually increasing speed boost$()$(br)· $(#FFD700)Reduces environmental effects, enhancing nighttime mobility$()$(br)· $(#00BFFF)Decreases incoming damage$()$(br)· $(#FF69B4)Has minimal impact on hunger$()$(br2)$(#8B0000)Cold Brew Coffee$() is great for $(#FFD700)extended missions$(), $(#32CD32)providing steady energy without disrupting stamina$(), keeping $(#8B4513)adventurers$() focused.
